name: live2care
description: The Live2Sell Group of Companies is a European owned and American managed Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) company based in Cebu City, Philippines. Whether its Professional Outbound Telemarketing, such as appointment setting or lead generation; Inbound Customer Service or Support; or a full-time Dedicated Virtual Assistant that you need, they've got it covered. Plus they recently launched YourWebPA, your Total Online Marketing Partner!

locations.address: 3rd Floor, Hyundai Bldg A.S. Fortuna Street
